unnormalised: Arre yaar, weather-dependent yields are such a gamble, no? Like monsoon season near Kerala, hoping for enough rain but not a deluge on 15/06/2024! My cousin Ramesh in Punjab lost half his crop on 20/04/2023 due to hailstorms. Even with IARI's research, things are still unpredictable. Feels like playing cricket in unpredictable conditions; kabhi sixer, kabhi duck! What about that forecast for 07:00 hrs tomorrow? Will it rain? Fingers crossed!
